name: FOOSBALL BY THE BAY feat. Gogglins
name_original: FOOSBALL BY THE BAY feat. Gogglins
description:
You play Foosball by the Bay. Requires 2 players (Local multiplayer). 

Made during Global Game Jam 2020 (https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/foosball-bay-1)

Controls: 

Player 1
A/Z - Move doggo up/down
Left Shift - Kick ball 

Player 2
'/slash - Move doggo up/down
Right Shift - Kick ball

Spacebar - Reset the ball (to the middle). Use this in cases where the ball gets stuck
R - Restart the game from the start

Made by:

Art - Jane Suteerawanit (artstation: tigerjane, Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/jane-suteerawanit-745249176/)
Programming - Dominic Chong (itch.io: glazed, Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/dominic-chong-092871b4/)
